Menpora Minta PSSI Fokus Piala Dunia dan Jalani Inpres No 3 Tahun 2019
04 Nov 2019, 20:57 by Anggi Tiar


Menpora Minta PSSI Fokus Piala Dunia dan Jalani Inpres No 3 Tahun 2019

KBRN, Jakarta : Menteri Pemuda dan Olahraga (Menpora) Zainudin Amali meminta kepada pengurus Persatuan Sepak Bola Seluruh Indonesia (PSSI) yang terpilih dalam Kongres Pemilihan PSSI, Sabtu (2/11/2019) lalu fokus terhadap penyelenggaraan tuan rumah Piala Dunia U-20 2021 serta menjalani Inpres No 3 Tahun 2019. Zainudin meminta agar PSSI yang kini di pimpin oleh Mochamad Iriawan menyikapi perhelatan tuan rumah Piala Dunia U-20 2021 menjadi konsen tersendiri. Zainudin mengaku, dalam waktu dekat, setelah disiapkan peran dan fungsi masing-masing antara Kemenpora dan PSSI, dirinya akan menghadap Presiden, Joko Widodo guna melaporkan sekaligus meminta arahan."Kita sudah saling memahami mana wilayah tanggungjawab pemerintah dan mana yang menjadi tanggungjawab PSSI. Kita akan minta waktu Bapak Presiden untuk menghadap, melaporkan, dan mohon arahan tentang Piala Dunia U-20," ungkap Zainudin usai menerima kunjungan Ketua Umum PSSI Mochamad Iriawan, di Ruang Kerja Lantai 10 Graha Pemuda, Senayan, Jakarta Pusat, Senin (4/11/2019). "Pemerintah akan mendukung penuh apa yang secara teknis akan disiapkan PSSI, selain sukses penyelenggaraan, sukses prestasi kita ingin raih," tambahnya menejelaskan bahwa pihaknya dalam hal ini Kemenpora akan mendukung penuh penyelenggaraan Piala Dunia U-20 2021 tersebut.Selain itu, terkait amanah dari Inpres No 3 Tahun 2019 tentang Percepatan Pembangunan Persepakbolaan Nasional, Zainudin meminata agar PSSI segera membuat roadmap sepakbola Indonesia. Menurutnya, hal itu meningkatkan prestasi sepak bola Tanah Air. "Pak Iwan (sapaan akrab Mochamad Iriawan) dan kawan-kawan saya ingatkan ada amanat Inpres yang harus segera dibuat yaitu roadmap sepakbola Indonesia, ini tugas yang harus segera dilakukan," jelassnya. Terakhir menyangkut birokrasi, Menpora mengajak untuk tidak saling menunggu, lakukan komunikasi dengan intens, tidak harus jalur formal yang kaku."Sekarang komunikasi tidak ada yang sulit, tidak perlu saling menunggu, siapa yang sempat lakukan komunikasi dengan intens. Saya tegaskan mengurus olahraga tidak bisa sendirian, semua harus bersinergi," tutup Zainudin.

Menpora Asks PSSI to Focus on the World Cup and Live Inpres No 3 of 2019
Nov 04 2019, 20:57 by Anggi Tiar


Menpora Asks PSSI to Focus on the World Cup and Live Inpres No 3 of 2019

KBRN, Jakarta: Minister of Youth and Sports (Menpora) Zainudin Amali asked the board of the All Indonesian Football Association (PSSI) who was elected in the PSSI Election Congress, Saturday (11/02/2019) then focus on organizing the host of the U-20 World Cup 2021 and underwent Presidential Instruction No. 3 of 2019. Zainudin requested that PSSI, which is now led by Mochamad Iriawan, address the event of the host of the 2021 U-20 World Cup to become its own concern. Zainudin admitted, in the near future, after having prepared their respective roles and functions between Kemenpora and PSSI, he would face the President, Joko Widodo to report and ask for direction. "We already understand each other which are the areas of government responsibility and which are the responsibilities of PSSI. We "I will ask for time for the President to address, report, and ask for guidance on the U-20 World Cup," said Zainudin after receiving a visit from PSSI Chairperson Mochamad Iriawan, in the 10th Floor Graha Pemuda Workroom, Senayan, Central Jakarta, Monday (11/4) / 2019). "The government will fully support what PSSI will technically prepare, in addition to the successful implementation, the successful achievement we want to achieve," he added explaining that his side in this case the Ministry of Youth and Sports will fully support the holding of the 2021 U-20 World Cup. In addition, related to the mandate of Inpres No 3 of 2019 concerning the Acceleration of National Football Development, Zainudin requested PSSI to immediately make a roadmap for Indonesian football. According to him, it increased football achievements in the country. "Pak Iwan (Mochamad Iriawan's nickname) and friends remind me there is an Inpres mandate that must be immediately made, namely the Indonesian soccer roadmap, this is a task that must be done immediately," he explained. Finally, regarding bureaucracy, the Menpora invited not to wait for each other, do intense communication, do not have to be rigid formal channels. "Now there is no difficult communication, no need to wait for each other, who can do intense communication. I insist that taking care of sports cannot all alone must all work together, "concluded Zainudin.
